en.title: HVAC Technician Management System | PraticOS
en.description: Organize your HVAC business and grow! Work order system for AC technicians with scheduling, equipment history and financial control. Start free.
en.keywords: HVAC software, air conditioning technician app, AC maintenance system, refrigeration work order, HVAC business management
en.ogDescription: Organize your HVAC business! WO system with scheduling, equipment history and financial control. Start free.

hero.title: Organize your HVAC business:
hero.subtitle: No more paperwork! Complete history of each equipment, smart scheduling that never forgets an appointment and financial control to know how much you really make.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for HVAC technicians

items.title: Manual and messy management
items.text: Contract and maintenance control all manual. Lose customers and redo work due to lack of organization.

items.title: No equipment history
items.text: Customer calls with a problem and you don't remember what you already did on that AC. Slower diagnosis.

items.title: Maintenance paperwork
items.text: Generating maintenance documents manually is bureaucratic and time-consuming. Risk of losing contracts.

items.title: Forget appointments
items.text: Messy schedule, time conflicts. Customer keeps waiting and you lose their trust.

items.title: Disorganized billing
items.text: Late payments, irregular cash flow. Don't know who owes and how much you have to receive.

items.title: Customer asks where you are
items.text: Constant calls asking when you'll arrive. Interrupts your field work.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for daily HVAC technician operations

items.title: Complete digital WO
items.text: No more paperwork! Create WOs on your phone with photos, values and equipment history.

items.title: Equipment history
items.text: Know everything about each AC: previous maintenance, parts replaced, notes.

items.title: Smart scheduling
items.text: Never forget an appointment. Automatic alerts for you and the customer.

items.title: Photos and reports
items.text: Document each service with photos. Professional reports in just a few clicks.

items.title: Financial control
items.text: Know how much you have to receive, who's late and your real profit.

items.title: Link for customer
items.text: Customer tracks service status on their phone. Fewer calls, more productivity.

checklist.title: Maintenance
checklist.text: Standardize your maintenance with digital checklists. Document each verified item and generate automatic reports.

items.text: Equipment photos
Inlet/outlet temperature
Electric current (Amps)
Filter cleaning
Gas check
Operation test

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools to boost your productivity

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create complete work orders with photos, history and values. All organized on your phone.

items.title: Unlimited Photos
items.text: Document each service with photos. Prove the work done to the customer.

items.title: Professional PDF
items.text: Generate reports and receipts in PDF. Professionalism that impresses and retains.

items.title: Financial Control
items.text: Complete dashboard: billing, receipts, receivables and real profit.

items.title: Customer Database
items.text: Complete history of each customer and equipment. Access everything in seconds.

items.title: Tracking Link
items.text: Customer tracks service on their phone. Fewer calls, more productivity.

testimonial.quote: Before, contract and maintenance control was all manual and messy. With PraticOS I saved time, reduced errors and project much more professionalism to my customers.
testimonial.name: Carlos Henrique

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent.

items.question: Does it work offline?
items.answer: You need internet to sync data, but you can view already loaded WOs offline. In practice, with 4G you won't have problems.

items.question: Does it work for companies with multiple technicians?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS works for both independent technicians and companies with teams. Each technician accesses on their phone.

items.question: Does it have maintenance scheduling control?
items.answer: PraticOS helps you organize recurring maintenance and generate reports. You can adapt checklists to your maintenance needs.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team understands the reality of HVAC technicians.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
